item.title: 阿里巴巴支持的班马网络计划在香港上市
item.description: 阿里巴巴周四表示，自动驾驶软件公司班马网络科技正计划在香港证券交易所单独上市。【原文：Alibaba said on Thursday that autonomous-driving software firm Banma Network Technology is planning a separate listing on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 博雅银行任命法伊兹-艾哈迈德（Faiz Ahmad）和迈克-朱（Mike Joo）为投资银行部新联席主管，备忘录称
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，美国银行周三宣布重组其全球企业与投资银行业务（GCIB），任命法伊兹-艾哈迈德（Faiz Ahmad）和迈克-朱（Mike Joo）为全球投资银行业务的新任联席主管。【原文：Bank of America on Wednesday announced a reshuffle in its global corporate and investment banking (GCIB) business, naming Faiz Ahmad and Mike Joo as new co-heads of global investment banking, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 交易日 人工智能疲劳，政策阴谋
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司董事长辞职，出任巴西石油监管机构职务
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司（Petrobras）周三表示，董事长皮特罗-门德斯（Pietro Mendes）已辞去董事长一职，并辞去其在董事会的席位。【原文：Brazilian state-run oil firm Petrobras said on Wednesday that chairman Pietro Mendes has resigned from the role, as well as from his seat on the board of directors.】

item.title: 联邦调查局警告俄罗斯黑客攻击美国关键基础设施
item.description: 美国联邦调查局（FBI）和思科（Cisco）周三表示，与俄罗斯一些最猖獗的网络间谍组织有关联的黑客在过去一年里一直在利用旧版思科软件中的一个漏洞，攻击与关键基础设施 IT 系统相关的数千台网络设备。【原文：Hackers associated with some of Russia’s most prolific cyber espionage units have over the last year been leveraging a vulnerability in older Cisco software to target thousands of networking devices associated with critical infrastructure IT systems, the FBI and Cisco said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美元通用公司召回 Donny Lau 加入，担任财务总监
item.description: Dollar General 周三任命前雇员 Donny Lau 为新任首席财务官，接替 Kelly Dilts，于 10 月 20 日生效。【原文：Dollar General on Wednesday named former employee Donny Lau as its new chief financial officer, effective October 20, replacing Kelly Dilts.】

item.title: FanDuel 与交易所运营商 CME 合作推进赛事合约
item.description: 体育博彩公司 FanDuel 周三宣布与衍生品交易所 CME Group 合作，进军快速增长的赛事合同市场。【原文：Sports betting firm FanDuel has tied up with derivatives exchange CME Group to set its foot into the rapidly growing event contracts market, the companies announced on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道CVS 暂缓将吉利德公司的新型艾滋病预防针纳入药物覆盖清单
item.description: 美国最大的药房福利管理公司 CVS Health 的一位发言人告诉路透社，尽管吉利德科学公司（Gilead Sciences）的新型艾滋病预防药物的疗效已得到证实，但该公司暂时不会将这种药物加入其商业计划中。【原文：CVS Health , which runs the largest U.S. pharmacy benefit manager, will not add Gilead Sciences' new HIV prevention drug to its commercial plans for now, a spokesperson told Reuters, despite the medicine's proven effectiveness.】

item.title: 美国消费者持续谨慎，Coty预计本季度销售额将下滑
item.description: 科蒂公司（Coty）周三预计，尽管第四季度营收超过预期，但当季销售额仍将下降，原因是美国消费疲软给其高价美容产品的需求蒙上了阴影，这导致该公司股价在盘后交易中下跌了 12%。【原文：Coty on Wednesday forecast a drop in current-quarter sales despite edging past fourth-quarter revenue estimates, as weak spending in the U.S. cast a shadow on demand for its pricey beauty products, sending its shares down 12% in extended trading.】

item.title: Entergy 获得监管部门批准投资支持 Meta 的路易斯安那州数据中心
item.description: Entergy 公司路易斯安那州分公司周三表示，该公司已获得路易斯安那州公共服务委员会的批准，继续推进与 Meta 位于里奇兰教区的新数据中心相关的基础设施投资。【原文：Entergy's Louisiana unit received approval from the Louisiana Public Service Commission to move forward with infrastructure investments tied to Meta's new data center in Richland Parish, the utility firm said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国科技股跌跌不休显示人工智能贸易的脆弱性
item.description: 美国科技股在经历了大幅上涨之后，正显现出脆弱的迹象，这让一些投资者指出人工智能推动的涨势过猛，而基金则采取措施远离这个高歌猛进的行业。【原文：U.S. technology shares are showing signs of vulnerability after a massive run, which has some investors pointing to overdone AI-driven gains while funds have taken steps to position away from the high-flying sector.】

item.title: 秘鲁六月份对华黄金出口量超过 2024 年全年出口量
item.description: 根据秘鲁政府 8 月份公布的数据，2025 年上半年秘鲁对中国的黄金出口量激增，超过了去年全年的出口量。【原文：Peru's gold exports to China surged in the first half of 2025 to surpass shipments from all of last year, according to government data released in August.】

item.title: 致命坍塌事故发生后，智利科德尔科公司将埃尔泰尼恩特的产量定为 31.6 万吨
item.description: 智利矿业公司 Codelco (COBRE.UL) 首席执行官鲁本-阿尔瓦拉多（Ruben Alvarado）周三表示，在 7 月下旬发生致命坍塌事故后，该公司埃尔特尼恩特矿今年的铜产量预计将达到 31.6 万吨。【原文：Chilean miner Codelco (COBRE.UL) expects to produce 316,000 metric tons of copper at its El Teniente mine this year, CEO Ruben Alvarado said on Wednesday, after a deadly collapse at the site in late July.】

item.title: 墨西哥通胀率在 8 月上半月有所回升：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周三的一项民意调查显示，墨西哥的总体通胀率很可能在 8 月上半月出现反弹，这支撑了墨西哥央行再次下调其关键利率的前景，尽管该利率仍未达到官方目标。【原文：Mexico's headline inflation likely rebounded in the first half of August underpinning prospects that the central bank would cut its key interest rate again, even though the rate remained within the official target, a Reuters poll showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道美国法官警告巴西银行不要在当地实施制裁
item.description: 巴西最高法院法官亚历山大-德-莫赖斯（Alexandre de Moraes）最近受到美国政府的制裁，他告诉路透社，法院可以对巴西金融机构根据美国命令扣押或冻结国内资产的行为进行处罚。【原文：Brazilian Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes, who recently had sanctions imposed on him by the U.S. government, told Reuters that courts could punish Brazilian financial institutions for seizing or blocking domestic assets in response to U.S. orders.】

item.title: 纳斯达克指数再次下滑，人工智能的不安情绪令科技投资者惶恐不安
item.description: 科技股领跌华尔街，对人工智能的担忧引发了对其未来的争论。纳斯达克综合指数在过去两天下跌了约 2.4%，这是自 4 月份以来最严重的两天跌幅。【原文：Tech stocks are leading declines on Wall Street, with worries about AI spurring debates about its future. The Nasdaq Composite is down around 2.4% over the last two days, the worst two-day fall since April.】

item.title: 卢拉与马克龙在电话中讨论美国关税和南方共同市场-欧盟协议
item.description: 巴西政府在一份声明中说，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦周三与法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙通电话，讨论了美国关税和南方共同市场-欧盟贸易协议。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva spoke by phone on Wednesday with his French counterpart Emmanuel Macron and discussed U.S. tariffs and the Mercosur-European Union trade deal, Brazil's government said in a statement.】

item.title: 特斯拉六座版 Model Y 可能不会在美国推出
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，该公司本周在中国推出的新型六座Model Y车型可能永远不会在美国投产，理由是自动驾驶汽车的崛起。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk said the company's new six-seat Model Y variant, launched in China this week, might never enter production in the United States, citing the rise of self-driving vehicles.】

item.title: 由于关税不确定性的影响，索尼提高了 PlayStation 5 在美国的售价
item.description: 索尼公司将从本周四起把其 PlayStation 5 游戏机在美国的售价提高约 50 美元，因为这家日本企业集团正在应对电子游戏市场的缓慢复苏，而美国关税则有可能提高成本。【原文：Sony will raise prices of its PlayStation 5 consoles in the United States by around $50 from Thursday, as the Japanese conglomerate navigates a slow recovery in the videogame market while U.S. tariffs threaten to raise costs.】

item.title: 谷歌推出适度升级的 Pixel 智能手机和其他小工具
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）周三推出了全新的 Pixel 智能手机和小工具系列，加大了在广泛的产品生态系统中嵌入人工智能的力度。【原文：Alphabet’s Google introduced on Wednesday a new lineup of Pixel smartphones and gadgets, intensifying its efforts to embed artificial intelligence across a wide ecosystem of products.】

item.title: 迪斯尼新推出的 ESPN 应用程序面向有线电视以外的体育迷
item.description: 沃尔特-迪斯尼（Walt Disney）旗下的 ESPN 将于本周四开始首次在付费电视之外提供全套体育节目，届时该电视网将首次推出一款应用程序，该应用程序旨在成为直播比赛和个性化新闻、统计数据和集锦的中心。【原文：Walt Disney's ESPN will deliver its full range of sports programming outside of pay TV for the first time starting on Thursday, when the network debuts an app designed to be a hub for live games and personalized news, stats and highlights.】

item.title: 美国参议员桑德斯赞成特朗普入股英特尔等公司的计划
item.description: 美国自由党参议员伯尼-桑德斯（Bernie Sanders）周三表示支持唐纳德-特朗普总统的计划，即把美国对芯片制造商的拨款（包括对英特尔的109亿美元拨款）转化为政府在这些公司的股份。【原文：Liberal U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders on Wednesday threw his support behind President Donald Trump's plan to convert U.S. grants to chipmakers, including $10.9 billion for Intel, into government stakes in the companies.】

item.title: 消费者谨慎，美国零售商对假期前景看法不一
item.description: 塔吉特（Target）和家得宝（Home Depot）等美国大型零售商的销售和利润预测喜忧参半，这促使投资者质疑今年的关键假日季是否会产生通常与年底购物潮相关的意外之财。【原文：Mixed sales and profit forecasts from major U.S. retailers such as Target and Home Depot have prompted investors to question if this year's crucial holiday season will yield the windfall typically associated with a year-end shopping surge.】

item.title: 法国公司与 JetZero 合作开发氢动力航班
item.description: 一家法国技术初创公司周三公布了与清洁飞机企业 JetZero 合作的计划，以探索其未来型全机翼设计的潜在氢动力变体。【原文：A French technology startup unveiled plans on Wednesday to work with clean-aircraft venture JetZero to explore a potential hydrogen-powered variant of its futuristic all-wing design.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会起诉洛杉矶健身，称其超难取消健身房会员资格
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周三起诉了连锁健身房 LA Fitness 和其他健身房的经营者，称他们让取消会员资格变得异常困难。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission sued the operators of gym chain LA Fitness and other gyms on Wednesday, saying they have made it exceedingly difficult to cancel memberships.】

item.title: Prosus 称季度利润增长 54%，计划出售 20 亿美元资产
item.description: 荷兰技术投资者 Prosus 公司首席执行官周三在宣布季度盈利增长 54% 时表示，公司计划近期通过出售资产筹集 20 亿美元。【原文：Dutch technology investor Prosus plans to raise $2 billion through asset sales in the near term, the company's CEO said on Wednesday as he announced a 54% increase in quarterly earnings.】

item.title: 以色列将在美国资助下订购价值 5 亿美元的波音空中加油机
item.description: 以色列国防部周三表示，以色列计划购买两架波音公司制造的KC-46军用空中加油机，交易金额为5亿美元，由美国军事援助提供资金。【原文：Israel plans to buy two Boeing-made KC-46 military aerial refuelling tankers in a $500 million deal to be financed with U.S. military aid, the Israeli defence ministry said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 保时捷支持的 Group14 完成新一轮融资，控制了合资公司的电池材料工厂
item.description: Group14 Technologies 周三表示，在由韩国投资公司 SK 领投的最新一轮融资中，该公司已筹集到 4.63 亿美元，这家硅基电池材料初创公司的目标是扩大生产规模。【原文：Group14 Technologies said on Wednesday it had raised $463 million in its latest financing round led by South Korean investment firm SK , as the silicon-based battery material startup aims to scale up production.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，花旗正在调查针对财富主管西格的人力资源投诉
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，花旗集团已聘请律师事务所保罗-韦斯（Paul Weiss）调查对该行财富管理主管安迪-西格（Andy Sieg）行为的投诉。【原文：Citigroup has hired law firm Paul Weiss to investigate complaints about the behavior of the bank's wealth management chief, Andy Sieg, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，英特尔正与大型投资者洽谈折价增持股票事宜
item.description: 据 CNBC 周三报道，就在这家芯片制造商获得软银集团 20 亿美元注资的几天前，英特尔正在与其他大型投资者谈判，希望以折扣价获得注资。【原文：Intel is in talks with other large investors to receive an equity infusion at a discounted price, CNBC reported on Wednesday, just days after the chipmaker got a $2 billion capital injection from SoftBank Group .】
